headline: Should Phoenix’s US$5 Billion Credit Commitment and Revolut Talks Require Action From Blackstone (BX) Investors?
summary: Phoenix Financial and Blackstone recently announced a partnership under which Phoenix will invest up to US$5 billion across Blackstone-managed corporate, real estate, and asset-based credit strategies, while Blackstone remains a leading global credit manager with more than US$0.51 trillion in credit assets within its US$1.20 trillion alternatives platform. Alongside this, Blackstone’s early-stage wealth-management talks with Revolut suggest it is seeking new global distribution channels that...
